noun.description: An extinct herbivorous marsupial of the genus Nototherium (family Diprotodontidae), known from Australian fossils of the Pleistocene epoch and resembling a wombat (though larger in size).

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. From scientific Latin Nototherium, genus name, with omission of the ending: see -there.
